name: algorithms-workshop
description: A workshop on Data Structures and Algorithms

scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:jbelmont/algorithms-workshop.git gh-pages --force
scripts.gitbook:open: open `printf 'https://marcelbelmont.com/%s' $(git config --local --list | grep 'remote.origin.url' | awk '{split($0,a,"="); print a[2]}' | awk -F '/' '{ print $5}')`
